snippet.title: Anodyne 2: Shrinking from 3D to 2D
snippet.description:
Wishlist Anodyne 2! It'll be out in 2019 for Windows, Mac, Linux. No console plans yet.

Kartridge: (coming soon)
Itch. https://sean-han-tani.itch.io/anodyne-2
Steam. https://store.steampowered.com/app/877810/Anodyne_2_Return_to_Dust/

Join our newsletter:
https://analgesic.productions/

Join our Discord:
https://discordapp.com/invite/7snxjmj

Follow the development team on Twitter:

Sean Han Tani: https://twitter.com/sean_htch (Code, Music, Co-writer)
Marina Kittaka: https://twitter.com/even_kei (Art, Lead Writer)
Analgesic Productions: http://twitter.com/analgesicprod
